name: Catch the Worm
description:
In each and every life, some rain must fall...
Once upon a time, there lived a feathered fellow named Robyn, who parented a few youngsters in its nest. As time went by, the juveniles dined everything one could swallow, and demanded more. The only digestable nourishment was kept under the watchful eyes of Crows. Those black feathered, red eyed and rather cunning beasts are more than willing to defend their turf by any means necessary. Join Robyn on this adventure to save its offsprings from starvation by standing up face to face to its nemeses.

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Space bar to toggle flight
  • E to feed little birds
  • H to heal self
  • mouse buttons to fight crows and peck worms
